Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
Computer, Human
public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object

Describes a player of the game of Pig. Used mainly to roll the die and to keep track of scores.

          Random number generator.

Method Detail

rollDie

public int rollDie(java.lang.String who)
            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Returns a random integer in the range 1 to 6, inclusive.

Parameters:
who - Which player is rolling the die (for printing purposes).
Returns:
The result of a die roll.
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException

play

public int play(int previousScore)
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Plays out one turn, by rolling the die some number of times. The final score is the sum of all the rolls, except that a roll of 1 terminates the turn and gives a final score of zero.

Parameters:
previousScore - The accumulated points so far this turn.
Returns:
The final score at the end of this turn.
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException

playAgainTest

public abstract boolean playAgainTest(int n)
Abstract test used to determine whether to roll again.

Parameters:
n - The points accumulated so far this turn.
Returns:
Whether to roll again.
